Message.Msg: trying to pay a charge to ebay of a customer charge back,sold an item that was perfectly fine but customer complained before notifying me and ebay paid them and i never paid ebay, thus my account was suspended. im trying to take care of issue and resume buying and selling on ebay.....it has been over a year, my problem is i need to know what i need to pay and where to send it.
